=4 Escaping=

==4.1 The escape character==

The backslash '\' character is used as an escape character, i.e. the character immediately following the backslash is interpreted literally.

<tt><b>
```test```bcd```<br/>
=><br/>
```embedded```a$test$e```<br/>
=><br/>
embedded<br/>
=>abcde<br/>
```escaped```a\$test\$e```<br/>
=><br/>
escaped<br/>
=>a$test$e<br/>
</b></tt>
